Mailing list

Get help using Zeppelin or contribute to the project on our mailing lists:

  • users@zeppelin.incubator.apache.org is for usage questions, help, and announcements. subscribe, unsubscribe, archives
  • dev@zeppelin.incubator.apache.org is for people who want to contribute code to Zeppelin. subscribe, unsubscribe, archives
  • commits@zeppelin.incubator.apache.org is for commit messages and patches to Zeppelin. subscribe, unsubscribe, archives

Issue tracker

https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ZEPPELIN
